thread.title: Hawa Koomson Fires Back At President Mahama; Says You Are A Serial Liar!

author: wn.com
title: Hawa Koomson Fires Back At President Mahama; Says You Are A Serial Liar!
text: Member of Parliament for Awutu Senya East Constituency on the ticket of the opposition New Patriotic Party ( NPP ) in the Central Region , Hon. Hawa Koomson has riposte saying President Mahama fancy being branded with lies. According to her,
